cmowner:set.description: SFDX plugin that changes the owner of a campaign member for a specified campaign to a specific user.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

targetcampaign.name: targetcampaign
targetcampaign.description: Salesforce ID of the campaign you want to process

useridtoset.name: useridtoset
useridtoset.description: Salesforce ID of the user you want to specify as the owner
